title: BE need a rework
body:
So finally got to level 31, got a vi champion shard. Can't even unlock it because I don't have enough BE. Disenchanting it makes me have to level up again in order to get the 4800 champion I want. 

Brb, playing another 15 games because I need 200 BE more because the only way to get BE is leveling. Level 30 accounts without many champions are in the worst position right now.
